sentences.sContent: The stallion bucked as he fought against the reins holding him tightly in.
sentences.sCn: 那匹种马四蹄离地狂跳，试图挣脱紧紧拴住它的缰绳。

synos.tran: （美）钱，元；雄鹿；纨绔子弟；年轻的印第安人或黑人

phrases.pCn: 使振作；打起精神；[俚]加快
n. 轻易得来的钱；投机赚钱

trans.tranOther: if a horse bucks, it kicks its back feet into the air, or jumps with all four feet off the ground
a US, Canadian, or Australian dollar
